title: LINE : number of monthly active users 2014 to 2016
yAxis: Number of monthly users in millions
summary: Messaging app LINE is 's most popular online communication tool , peaking at approximately 220.0 millions monthly actives users in LINE during the fourth Quarter of 2016 .
LINE 's main target group are young adults aged 15 to 34 years , representing more than 50 millions of the company 's Japanese user base in 2018 .
The rise of LINE in The success story of messaging service LINE , a Japanese subsidiary of South Korean internet powerhouse Naver , started back in 2011 during the Great East LINE Earthquake .
gold: This statistic shows a timeline with the amount of monthly active LINE users worldwide as of the fourth quarter of 2016 . As of that period , the mobile messaging app announced more than 217 million monthly active users . In October 2014 , LINE had also reported 560 million registered users worldwide .
